text: Julian Knowle and Adil Shamasdin were the defending champions but chose not to defend their title. Scott Clayton and Jonny O'Mara won the title after defeating Laurynas Grigelis and Alessandro Motti 5–7, 6–3, [15–13] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Trofeo Faip-Perrel - Doubles 2018 Doubles
title: 2018 Trofeo Faip–Perrel – Doubles
